definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Silver, gold and platinum cards denote wealth classes.
sentences.chinese: 银卡，金卡和白金卡标志着不同的财富阶层。

sentences.english: I feel I affirm platinic writer on the net.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在网上肯定成不了白金作家。

sentences.english: Please show us your card so we can identify whether it is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 请出示您的信用卡，我们来识别是否属于白金卡系列。

sentences.english: The nib is in white gold and is rhodium-plated.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖为白金且为铑被镀。

sentences.english: It's a Visa platinum card issued by Yoyodyne Bank.
sentences.chinese: 这是优达因公司发行的威士白金卡。

sentences.english: High end and Good quality , Natural Platinum lens are thin and comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 品质良好，优等上品，自然的白金级亮眼睛。

sentences.english: Please indicate that if you wish to accept a Classic Card if you are not offered a Platinum Card.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你的白金卡申请未被接纳，是否愿意接受普通卡？

sentences.english: Would you like to apply for a gold or platinum card?
sentences.chinese: 您想要申请金卡还是白金卡？

sentences.english: It's famous for Big Ben , Buckingham Palace and Tower Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦以本钟白金汉宫和他桥而闻名。

sentences.english: London has many attractions, such as Big Ben and Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦有许多名胜，例如大笨钟和白金汉宫。

sentences.english: Then Mr Brown departed on the short ride to Buckingham Palace, to tender his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 布朗随后离开，经过一小段路后到白金汉宫递交辞呈。

sentences.english: 1230 - The bride's carriage procession arrives at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 王子夫妇乘坐的马车抵达白金汉宫。

sentences.english: It's a blue sapphire surrounded by diamonds set in white gold.
sentences.chinese: 是一枚有钻石围绕，在白金底上镶有蓝宝石的戒指。

sentences.english: It hopes to put Buckingham Palace into Street View in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 在不久的将来，白金汉宫的图片还将被收入街景地图。

sentences.english: Buckingham Palace is the royal family's London residence.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫是王室在伦敦居住。

sentences.english: To obtain a gold or platinum card you will need to have a higher annual income.
sentences.chinese: 获得金牌或白金卡，你必须有较高的年收入。

definition: bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
